definitions.definition: Able to form degrees or grades
Able to occur in varying degrees ; able to be inflected or modified to express degrees of meaning.
definitions.label_groups: linguistics , of a word or phrase

definitions.definition: steep , but still able to be climbed by a motor vehicle
